title: Simply Sushi Logo Typeface
content:
Need some help here, can anyone ID this typeface? Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131213045659/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_53.jpg) | 21.38 KB |
author: bobbynovoa

comments.content: What makes you so sure? Those "S"s are identical.

I retract my last comment.

I fell and hit my head last night so my vision is all messed up and I've been saying stupid things. The "S" and "i" are completely the same... the search is on.

[Gizmo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131213045659/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-g-type/gizmo/) has the same feel but not exact.

Nina

Cut and paste possibly, but then the "i's" are identical? but still cut and paste. Not that you are wrong, It is just so hard to tell : )

I use cut and paste all the time and I could make letters identical when I work but what is the point. It's a toss up. Check out www . ugly . com. Just kidding. Why would anyone copy these ugly forms?

Michael

It's not custom. Here it is again: [http://logopond.com/logos/34ba748364ec05de11ea2793a93c61af.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131213045659/http:/logopond.com/logos/34ba748364ec05de11ea2793a93c61af.png "http://logopond.com/logos/34ba748364ec05de11ea2793a93c61af.png")

The S's are identical. Gizmo is close, but it's not quite the same. I've been searching with no luck.

I've done quite a search and was fully expecting to find it as a free font but haven't had any luck at this point. With someone using it on LogoPond may indicate it's one of those fads. Maybe email the guy on LogoPond?

Time to check the Graffiti sets.

It's the astonishing [VNI Thuphap](http://web.archive.org/web/20131213045659/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=vni_thuphap&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=Simply+Sushi&nb_ppp=10&psize=l&classt=alpha) by HungLan Design.

Why in the world would anyone name a set of fonts that look nothing alike with the same name? Those aren't different styles, they are completely separate fonts. Grrr... :\

At least my gut reaction to check free fonts first was right.

Just wanted to post this for all to see. Very lovely and its free too.

Thanks for bringing up this topic.

Mikey :-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131213045659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/VNI_3517.png)
